transcription_link: Kemwell PFP Ltd- Remote Helpers - 2025/07/30 13:50 EEST - Notes by Geminiy
email_content:
Hello Peter,

I hope you've been doing well!

I wanted to stay in touch and reconnect after our last conversation about Kemwell PFP Ltd and your need for support managing your email organization and project correspondence. It was great learning more about your workflow and how much time is spent manually sorting and archiving messages across multiple project folders.

From our side, Remote Helpers can support you with:
üì© Personal or administrative assistants ‚Äî to help manage your inbox, organize emails by project, and set up structured filters in Outlook or Gmail.
üß© Data and document management specialists ‚Äî to keep project folders up to date and ensure communication is properly categorized.
‚öôÔ∏è Flexible collaboration options ‚Äî from part-time to full-time, with a 3-day free trial to test the workflow and fit before committing.

If you'd like, we can schedule a short follow-up call to review a few suitable candidate profiles and show how we can simplify your email and project management process.

üìÖ Would Tuesday or Wednesday at 11:00 - 12:00 your time work for you?
In the meantime, you can learn more about our services and available specialists at www.remotehelpers.com.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
